Han er Solas nye hovedtrener
Svenske Mika Anders Nurmi (49) er ansatt som ny hovedtrener i Sola HK.
05 Nov 2019, 15:50 by Mats Haugland
Det skriver klubben i en pressemelding tirsdag ettermiddag.
49-√•ringen har de siste √•rene jobbet som karrierer√•dgiver, gr√ºnder, mentaltrener og foredragsholder. Han har tidligere v√¶rt hovedtrener for lag som Fyllingen, Stord, Haugaland og for et norsk ungdomslandslag.
Nurmi har skrevet under en kontrakt som strekker seg ut innev√¶rende sesong, og starter i Sola-jobben mandag 25. november.
‚Äì Nurmi beskrives som en god lagspiller og lagbygger med kjernekompetanse p√• veiledning og mental trening. Han har ogs√• en bred bakgrunn som elitetrener, skriver klubben i pressemeldingen.

Etterlengtet opptur for Sola - tok knusende seier



Mika Nurmi (t.h.) er Solas nye hovedtrener. Her i samtale med dav√¶rende Drammen-trener Marinko Kurtovic fra perioden i Stord.üì∑ Morten Holm / Scanpix

Scott Harrington trakk seg som hovedtrener i Sola etter den elendige sesonginnledningen, og har n√• g√•tt over i en rolle som talentutvikler og ungdomskoordinator i klubben.
Mens Sola har jaktet p√• ny trener, har b√•de Viking-trener Joar Gjerde og Sola-assistent Kasper Andersen vikariert som A-lagstrener.
Sola tok s√∏ndag sin f√∏rste seier i eliteserien da de vant det viktige bunnoppgj√∏ret hjemme mot Follo. Topoengeren kom etter √•tte strake tap i ligaen, samt en pinlig cupexit mot Flint T√∏nsberg fra niv√• to.

Sola holder trenerkravene hemmelig


Gjerde overtar etter Harrington i Sola
text:
He is Sola's new head coach
Swedish Mika Anders Nurmi (49) is hired as new head coach at Sola HK.
05 Nov 2019, 15:50 by Mats Haugland
This is what the club writes in a press release on Tuesday afternoon.
The 49-year-old has worked as a career advisor, entrepreneur, mental trainer and lecturer in recent years. He has previously been head coach for teams such as Fyllingen, Stord, Haugaland and for a Norwegian youth national team.
Nurmi has signed a contract that extends this season, starting with the Sola job on Monday 25 November.
- Nurmi is described as a good team player and team builder with core competence in mentoring and training. He also has a broad background as an elite coach, the club writes in the press release.

Long awaited ride for Sola - took crushing victory



Mika Nurmi (t.h.) is Sola's new head coach. Here in conversation with the then Drammen coach Marinko Kurtovic from the period in Stord.üì∑ Morten Holm / Scanpix

Scott Harrington resigned as head coach at Sola after the miserable season opening, and has now transitioned to a role as talent developer and youth coordinator at the club.
While Sola has been hunting for a new coach, both Viking coach Joar Gjerde and Sola assistant Kasper Andersen have been substituted as A-team coaches.
The Sun took their first victory in the elite series on Sunday when they won the important bottom settlement at home against Follo. The top scorer came after eight straight losses in the league, as well as an embarrassing cupexit against Flint T√∏nsberg from level two.

The sun keeps the training requirements a secret


Gjerde takes over after Harrington in the Sola
